make one script wey fit:1.waka all ur post Dem con dey check check for imgur.com link (.png|.jpg|.jpeg);2. wey fit reupload d picture dem go talkimg.com (or imgbb);3.edit d post with d new linkHow u fit take use am:1.pick d image provider wey u wan use  (change provider to imgbb or talkimg - IMPORTANT: all lower case).2.if u wan use imgbb, u go need to create account and ur own API key. generate your API Key here Den put am for providers -> imgbb -> apiKey (example).3. enter Bitcointalk.org, (any page)4. open browser developer tools Dem for d console tab(Ctrl+Shift+I or F12).5. paste d script, make u press enter.6. open d page down, no close am make d script dey run. if u go fit, no use d forum(even for other tab) dis wan na to avoid limiting error Dem. if d error show, talk am for here or u ft run d script again(d whole thing go start again, but post Dem wey don already dey  fixed, no go run update again since Dem no con get imgur.com links).Script:- if u dey use TALKIMG, u dey free to swap d API key to ur own, if u don already get account for there. or else, @joker_josue don already create one for d script.- u go fit change where d page go from start. if u want make d script start from one particular page(i.e d error wey dey page 300 and u wan con start again from there).COLLECT D SCRIPT CODE FOR HERE:
